title: Why is my ping incredibly high but only on League?
body: I've done ping test after test and I did the whole cmb tracert thing and what I've found is my average ping is about 1000. I know this is absolutely horrid but its all I have at the moment. I can connect to League just fine but its obviously slow. However, my average ping for League is about 1800. I don't get why my ping is 800 higher on League than what I should have. Could it be the location of their servers?

replies.body: You could be onto something with your suspicions on it being the location of the server or how your connection is being routed. Let's take a closer look at how that connection looks after it's left your network with our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Let it scan some of those network logs and paste a screenshot of it here so I can take a look.
League servers may be located further than servers that you're pinging. 1000 ping is too big for playing League. I would consider changing your ISP.
